question_content.barrons:question: Disappointed in love, Miss Emily became _____________: she shut herself away in her empty mansion and refused to see another living soul.
question_content.barrons:explanation:
reclusive.

The second clause (the part of the sentence that follows the colon) provides the clue to the correct answer choice. Someone who shuts herself away in an empty mansion and refuses to see another living soul is by definition reclusive (hermitlike; solitary).

Cantankerous is incorrect. Cantankerous means peevish and bad-tempered. It makes little sense in the context. The second clause (the part of the sentence that follows the colon) provides the clue to the correct answer choice.

Phlegmatic is incorrect. Phlegmatic means not easily disturbed or excited. It makes no sense in the context. The second clause (the part of the sentence that follows the colon) provides the clue to the correct answer choice.

Autocratic is incorrect. Autocratic means tyrannical or domineering. It makes no sense in the context. The second clause (the part of the sentence that follows the colon) provides the clue to the correct answer choice.

Wistful is incorrect. Wistful means pensively sad or yearning. It makes no sense in the context. The second clause (the part of the sentence that follows the colon) provides the clue to the correct answer choice.
